ssot__Promotion__dlm.name: Promotion
ssot__Promotion__dlm.description: The Promotion DMO represents loyalty promotion details, such as the type of promotion.

ssot__ActivePromotionStartDate__c.description: The start date of the promotion.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__CumulativeUsageTargetAmount__c.description: The target value of promotion based on frequency of participation.

ssot__CurrencyId__c.description: A reference ID to denomination of currency defined in promotion, for example, dollars or Euro.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name referring to the source of records also identified as the external source ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DefaultVoucherDefinitionId__c.description: A reference ID to the main voucher where other vouchers are awarded to individuals.

ssot__DiscountBuyAmount__c.description: The order value, before surcharges, required to receive a discount.

ssot__DiscountBuyCount__c.description: The quantity that must be purchased to receive discount or quantity of free product.

ssot__DiscountExclusivityTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to cases where promotion recipients qualify for discounts in more than one way.

ssot__DiscountTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to types of discounts available in promotion, for example fixed price or percentage-off.

ssot__DiscountValueAmt__c.description: The amount deducted from an order subtotal if conditions are met.

ssot__EndDate__c.description: The last date the promotion is available to customers.

ssot__EnrollmentEndDate__c.description: The last date when customers can enroll in the promotion.

ssot__EnrollmentStartDate__c.description: The first date when customers can enroll in the promotion.

ssot__EvaluationOrderRankNbr__c.description: The order of applying promotions to the product cost.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__FulfillmentActionId__c.description: A reference ID to how marketing promotion provides values to customer, for example via loyalty points, cash discounts, or voucher.

ssot__InactivePromotionEndDate__c.description: The date when the promotion becomes inactive.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsActive__c.description: An indicator if the promotion is available to customers.

ssot__IsEnrollmentRequired__c.description: An indicator if the promotion can only be applied to persons who have enrolled in it.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LeadId__c.description: A reference ID to person or company that showed interest in company's products.

ssot__LeadSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to the source where the lead was obtained.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramId__c.description: A reference ID to marketing strategy designed to encourage customers to continue shopping at or use services of a business associated with the program.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId__c.description: A reference ID to the value or currency the loyalty program offers to customers.

ssot__Objectivetext__c.description: The business goal of the promotion, for example, a "10% increase in product revenue."

ssot__PointsQuantity__c.description: The points awarded during a promotion.

ssot__PrimaryCampaignId__c.description: A reference ID to a marketing project that you want to plan, manage, and track.

ssot__PromotionClassId__c.description: A reference ID to categories of promotions, for example, product, order, or shipping.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Promotion DMO.

ssot__PromotionMethodId__c.description: A reference ID to the method of promotion, for example, displays, coupons, or a contest.

ssot__PromotionReasonId__c.description: A reference ID to why promotion was created, for example advertising or publicity.

ssot__PromotionStatusId__c.description: A reference ID to status of marketing promotion, for example draft, activated, or complete.

ssot__PromotionTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to type of promotion.

ssot__PromotionalImage__c.description: A graphic used to enhance promotion in a digital format.

ssot__PromotionalMessage__c.description: A message displayed to possible consumers of promotion, for example, "20% off all shoes for Mother's Day".

ssot__StartDate__c.description: The date the promotion is available to customers.

ssot__TotalRewardValueAmount__c.description: The total savings or reward value accumulated for promotion.
